settings.hero_subtitle: Sustainability at Olitalia is not a destination — it's a direction.
settings.hero_description: We act every day to reduce our footprint, preserve nature's balance, and build a more responsible future.
settings.plastic_description: Our long-term project to reduce plastic waste across every stage of production. We've replaced all single-use plastics in our facilities and continue to develop new packaging solutions made from recyclable and renewable materials.
settings.collaboration_description:
Sustainability is a shared journey. We believe the best ideas emerge through collaboration, which is why we work closely with chefs, researchers, and organizations who share our values.

In Emilia-Romagna, we helped coordinate a focus group on the olive-growing and oil supply chain, in partnership with Clust-ER Agroalimentare and the University of Bologna.
settings.circle_description: We apply full circle thinking to our entire production model. By finding new uses for byproducts and promoting recycling within our supply chain, we transform potential waste into valuable resources.
settings.life_title: Used but Full of Life Project
settings.life_description: Co-created with APCI and Amicambiente, this initiative promotes the proper disposal and recovery of used vegetable oils in the foodservice sector, helping prevent environmental contamination.
settings.quote_text: Sustainability is a shared journey. The best ideas emerge through collaboration, bringing together people who care about the future of food.
settings.people_description:
Behind every initiative are the people who make it possible. We're proud of our team — more than 130 individuals who bring passion, skill, and creativity to their work every day.

We invest in training, safety, and well-being to ensure that our workplace reflects the same values we bring to our products: care, quality, and respect.
settings.resource_description: We optimize water and energy consumption throughout production and logistics, using data-driven systems to monitor performance and minimize waste.
